page.title: 09MY BIRTHDAY PARTY
page.content: 0n Sunday it was my 8th birthday and I had a party at the Leisure pool.When we got there we told the lady that there were 12 of us .My daddy took the birthday cake to the cafe.Then we went to the changing room.We got changed and we went to the big pool.We did some jumping and diving and swimming and we played with a ball. Then my Aunty told us that it was time to get out.Then we got dressed and we dried our hair.Then we went to the cafe and had our party.We had chips,fishfingers and baked beans,and we had jelly fruit and ice cream for our pudding and after that we all sang happy birthday. My birthday presents were a camera,a flower fairy doll,a care bear,and a my little pony's grooming parlour.I had lots of birthday cards too. {By Lydia Jordan age 8
